articles.title: "I Continue To Remain CEO": Byju Raveendran Day After Shareholders' Move - NDTV
articles.description: Amidst growing trouble in the edtech firm Byju's, the company's CEO Byju Raveendran told employees that he continues to remain the chief executive officer of the company.
articles.content: Amidst growing trouble in the edtech firm Byju's, company's CEO Byju Raveendran told employees that he continues to remain the chief executive officer of the company. On Saturday, Mr Raveendran wrote… [+2009 chars]
